bike.description: Kinesium alloy main triangle, asymmetrical chainstays with 12x142mm thru-axle dropouts, 130mm travel mp4 linkage design, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, cartridge bearing pivots, Rock Shox Monarch RT3 High Volume w/ 3-position compression (open/platform/lock), 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Maxle rear axle

components.description: Rock Shox Revelation 650B RCT3 w/ 3-position compression adjust (open/platform/lock), 15mm axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound adjust, 130mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
American Classic 650B XC tubeless disc wheels, AC 15mm thru-axle front and AC225 12 x 142mm thru-axle rear hubs
Schwalbe Racing Ralph 650B, 27.5x2.25, Folding, Dual Compound
SRAM XO Type 2 mid-cage rear and XO 34.9mm top pull front
Crank Brothers Iodine 2, 700mm x 30mm rise, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep
Avid XO hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front and 160mm rear HS1 rotors
